name: The Old Ones (DADIU)
description:
Dive into a secret society of occult agents, learn the skills required to become an Eldritch Hunter, and fight The Old Ones, without going insane.

How to play:

  • Xbox Controller:
    • Left stick for movement
    • A button / Right Trigger to Slash 
    • X button / Left Trigger to Dash
  • Mouse & Keyboard:
    • Left click or space to Slash
    • Right-click or shift to Dash
    • WASD Movement
